CreateLibrary.document: This API is used to create a PaaS service media library.
CreateLibrary.name: Creates a media library

DeleteLibrary.document: This API is used to delete a PaaS service media library.
DeleteLibrary.name: Delete a media library

DescribeLibraries.document: This API is used to query the PaaS service repository list.
DescribeLibraries.name: Query a media library

DescribeLibrarySecret.document: This API is used to query the PaaS service Media Library Key.
DescribeLibrarySecret.name: Query a media library key

DescribeOfficialInstances.document: This API is used to query official cloud disk instances.
DescribeOfficialInstances.name: Query an official instance

DescribeOfficialOverview.document: This API is used to query overview data of official cloud disk instances.
DescribeOfficialOverview.name: Query official instance overview data

DescribeTrafficPackages.document: This API is used to query traffic packages.
DescribeTrafficPackages.name: Query a traffic package

ModifyLibrary.document: This API is used to modify the configuration items of a PaaS service media library.
ModifyLibrary.name: Modify a media library configuration item

SendSmsCode.document: This API is used to send SMS verification codes for changing the admin account of a super official cloud disk instance.
SendSmsCode.name: Send sms verification code

VerifySmsCode.document: This API is used to verify the SMS verification code for rebinding the super administrator account of an official cloud disk instance.
VerifySmsCode.name: Verifies the SMS verification code

members.document: Media library name. up to 50 characters.
members.name: Name

members.document: Specifies the remark, up to 250 characters.
members.name: Remark

members.document: Specifies the full name of the bucket, which cannot be changed after creation. the current version no longer supports specified buckets.
members.name: BucketName

members.document: Bucket location cannot be changed after creation. the current version no longer supports specifying bucket location.
members.name: BucketRegion

members.document: Media library configuration item. some parameters cannot be changed after creation.
members.name: LibraryExtension

members.document: Media library ID.
members.name: LibraryId

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Media library ID.
members.name: LibraryId

members.name: RequestId

members.document: Specifies one or more media library ids for querying, with a maximum of 100 per request.
members.name: LibraryIds

members.document: Page number, int, used in conjunction with PageSize. default value is 1.
members.name: PageNumber

members.document: Number of items per page, integer, used in conjunction with PageNumber. default value is 20. maximum value is 100.
members.name: PageSize

members.document: Specifies whether to query the super admin account bound to the instance. default value is false.
members.name: SuperAdminAccount

members.name: PageNumber

members.name: AutoRenew

members.document: Specifies whether the super admin account is bound to a mobile number.
members.name: BindPhone

members.document: Instance list
members.name: List

members.document: Total number.
members.name: TotalCount

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Specifies the instance count of cloud disks.
members.name: Quantity

members.document: Indicates the total storage already used in Bytes. since the number type has precision limitations, this field is a String type.
members.name: Storage

members.document: Total number of users already allocated and used.
members.name: UserCount

members.document: Public network downstream traffic this month in Bytes. since the number type has precision limitations, this field is a String type.
members.name: InternetTraffic

Instance.document: Describes official cloud disk instance information.

members.document: Instance ID.
members.name: InstanceId

members.document:
Dedicated domain name. if the instance has no dedicated domain name, this attribute is null.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: Domain

members.document: Effective time.
members.name: EffectiveTime

members.document:
Expiration time. if the instance is pay-as-you-go or permanently valid, this attribute is null.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: ExpireTime

members.document:
Number of users. if the instance uses pay-as-you-go billing or has unlimited users, this attribute is null.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: UserLimit

members.document:
Storage capacity in Bytes. this field is of String type due to precision limitations of numeric types. this property is null for pay-as-you-go instances or instances with unlimited storage capacity.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: StorageLimit

members.document:
Storage capacity in GB. if the instance uses pay-as-you-go billing or has unlimited storage capacity, this attribute is null.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: StorageLimitGB

members.document: Is expired isolation.
members.name: Isolated

members.document: Renewal flag. 0: manual renewal; 1: automatic renewal; 2: non-renewal upon expiration.
members.name: AutoRenew

members.document:
Specifies the super administrator account. if no selection query is made for the instance-bound super administrator account or the current instance is not bound to a super administrator account, this attribute is null.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: SuperAdminAccount

members.document: In selected bucket mode, shows bucket usage.
members.name: Bucket

members.document:
Specifies the log bucket usage in selected mode.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: LogBucket

members.document: Media library ID.
members.name: LibraryId

members.document: Specifies the friendly name of the media library.
members.name: Name

members.document: Remarks.
members.name: Remark

members.document: Specifies the COS storage bucket bound to the media library.
members.name: BucketName

members.document: Specifies the region where the COS bucket bound to the media library is located.
members.name: BucketRegion

members.document: Specifies the access domain of the business API for the media library.
members.name: AccessDomain

members.document: Creation time of the media library.
members.name: CreationTime

members.document: Media library configuration item.
members.name: LibraryExtension

members.document: Media library amount in Bytes. since the number type has precision limitations, this field is a String type.
members.name: Size

members.document: Number of media library directories. since the String type is used due to precision limitations of the number type, this field is of String type.
members.name: DirNum

members.document: Number of files in the media library. since the String type is used due to precision limitations of the number type, this field is of String type.
members.name: FileNum

members.document: Specifies whether it is a file type media library that can store any type of file (true) or a media type media library that can only store images and playable video types (false). defaults to false. cannot be modified once created.
members.name: IsFileLibrary

members.document: true indicates a multi-tenant space media library, allowing the creation of multiple tenant spaces. false indicates a single-tenant space media library, where tenant spaces cannot be created and only the default single tenant space can be used. defaults to false. cannot be modified after the media library is created.
members.name: IsMultiSpace

members.document: Specifies the storage type for files saved to cloud object storage. valid values: STANDARD, STANDARD_IA, INTELLIGENT_TIERING, MAZ_STANDARD, MAZ_STANDARD_IA, and MAZ_INTELLIGENT_TIERING. defaults to STANDARD. when using a multi-AZ bucket, MAZ_ prefixed storage types for multi-AZ are automatically used, otherwise non-MAZ_ prefixed storage types for non-multi-AZ are used. when specifying INTELLIGENT TIERING storage INTELLIGENT_TIERING or MAZ_INTELLIGENT_TIERING, the bucket must have INTELLIGENT TIERING storage enabled beforehand, otherwise failure will be returned. cannot be modified after the media library is created.
members.name: CosStorageClass

members.document: Specifies whether the recycle bin feature is enabled. defaults to false.
members.name: UseRecycleBin

members.document:
Specifies the number of days to automatically delete items in the recycle bin when enabled, must not exceed 1095 (3 years). a value of 0 indicates no automatic deletion, defaults to 0. this property is null when the recycle bin is not enabled.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: AutoRemoveRecycledDays

members.document: Whether to enable the file path search feature. is false by default.
members.name: EnableSearch

members.document: Specifies whether to deny the configuration request when setting the space quota for a media library or tenant and the quota is less than the used storage capacity. is false by default.
members.name: DenyOnQuotaLessThanUsage

members.document: Specifies whether the earlier version is enabled. defaults to false.
members.name: EnableFileHistory

members.document:
Specifies the maximum number of historical versions to retain for a single file when versioning is enabled, with a value range of 1 to 999. this property may be null when versioning is not enabled.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: FileHistoryCount

members.document:
Specifies the maximum days to retain earlier versions when versioning is enabled, with a value range of 0 to 999. when set to 0, it represents permanent retention. this property may be null when versioning is not enabled.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: FileHistoryExpireDay

members.document: The maximum length of a directory or file name must not exceed 255, with a default value of 255. modifying this parameter will not affect existing directories or file names. if the value of this field is decreased, the length of existing directories or file names exceeding the target value does not change.
members.name: MaxDirFileNameLength

members.document:
Whether public read is enabled. once enabled, read operations require no access token. it is false by default. this property is supported only in single-tenant space media libraries. otherwise, it is null.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: IsPublicRead

members.document:
Specifies whether the multi-album feature is enabled for the media type media library. once enabled, first-level directories (albums) can be created, and media files can only be saved in these albums. unless enabled, albums cannot be created, and media files can only be saved in the root directory. defaults to false. this property is only supported for single-tenant space media type media libraries, otherwise it is null. cannot be modified after the media library is created.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: IsMultiAlbum

members.document:
Specifies whether the media library of the media type allows image uploads, set to true by default. this property is supported only for the media library of the media type in a single tenant space, otherwise it is null.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: AllowPhoto

members.document:
Specifies the allowed extensions when the media type media library allows photo uploads. empty array by default. at this point, it will automatically determine based on the MIME type corresponding to the file extension. this property is supported only for single-tenant space media type media libraries. otherwise, the property is null.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: AllowPhotoExtName

members.document:
Media type media library specifies whether video upload is allowed, set to true by default. this property is supported only in single tenant space media type media library, otherwise the property is null.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: AllowVideo

members.document:
Specifies the allowed extensions when the media type media library permits video uploads. the default is an empty array, at which point it will automatically determine based on the MIME type corresponding to the file extension. this property is supported only for single-tenant space media type media libraries, otherwise it is null.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: AllowVideoExtName

members.document:
Specifies the file extensions allowed in the file type media library, empty by default. at this point, all types of files are upload allowed. this property is supported only for the file type media library in a single tenant space, otherwise it is null.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: AllowFileExtName

members.document:
Specifies whether to perform sensitive content identification during image upload. the value is false by default. this property is supported only in the single-tenant space media library, otherwise it is null.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: RecognizeSensitiveContent

members.document: Media library ID.
members.name: LibraryId

members.document: Media library name. up to 50 characters. leave empty to keep the current value.
members.name: Name

members.document: Specifies the remark, up to 250 characters. leave it empty to keep the original value.
members.name: Remark

members.document: Media library configuration item. some parameters cannot be changed after creation and only modify passed parameters. if this parameter is not passed, no configuration item will be modified.
members.name: LibraryExtension

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Captcha target, currently supported: rebind super administrator account, BindSuperAdmin; trial version business upgrade, ChannelUpdateVerify.
members.name: Purpose

members.document: Specifies the mobile number as the super admin account.
members.name: PhoneNumber

members.document: Official cloud disk instance ID.
members.name: InstanceId

members.document: Specifies the country code of the mobile number that serves as the super administrator account. defaults to +86.
members.name: CountryCode

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Specifies the instance ID offset by the traffic package.
members.name: InstanceId

members.document:
Dedicated domain name. if the instance has no dedicated domain name, this attribute is null.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: Domain

members.document: Source type of the traffic package. valid values: 0 (purchase), 1 (complimentary).
members.name: Type

members.document: Total traffic in Bytes. since the number type has precision limitations, this field is a String type.
members.name: Size

members.document: Total traffic in GB.
members.name: SizeGB

members.document: Remaining traffic in Bytes. this field is of String type due to precision limitations of numeric data types.
members.name: Remain

members.document: Used traffic in Bytes. since the number type has precision limitations, this field is a String type.
members.name: Used

members.document: Usage percentage. since the String type is used due to precision limitations of the number type, this field is of String type.
members.name: UsedPercentage

members.document: Effective time, the order time of the traffic package.
members.name: EffectiveTime

members.document:
Expiration time, which is the expiration time of the offset instance. if the traffic package offsets a pay-as-you-go or permanently valid instance, this attribute is null.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: ExpireTime

members.document: Captcha target, currently supported: rebind super administrator account, BindSuperAdmin; trial version business upgrade verification, ChannelUpdateVerify.
members.name: Purpose

members.document: Specifies the mobile number as the super admin account.
members.name: PhoneNumber

members.document: Specifies the sms verification code.
members.name: Code

members.document: Official cloud disk instance ID.
members.name: InstanceId

members.document: Specifies the country code of the mobile number that serves as the super administrator account. defaults to +86.
members.name: CountryCode

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId
